administrator.name: Administrator
administrator.description: Most cards with no tags (don't forget the corporation and Prelude cards)

benefactor.name: Benefactor
benefactor.description: Highest TR. If you play with this Award, count it before all other Awards and Milestones!

biologist.name: Biologist
biologist.description: Most bio tags combined (plant, microbe, and animal)

celebrity.name: Celebrity
celebrity.description: Most cards that have a cost of 20 M€ or more

collector.name: Collector
collector.description: Most different types of resources, both on your player board and on your cards

founder.name: Founder
founder.description: Most tiles adjacent to special tiles

highlander.name: Highlander
highlander.description: Most tiles that are not adjacent to ocean

incorporator.name: Incorporator
incorporator.description: Most cards costing 10 M€ or less

landscaper.name: Landscaper
landscaper.description: Most tiles connected together (each player counts his/her largest group of tiles)

manufacturer.name: Manufacturer
manufacturer.description: Highest production of steel and heat combined

miner.name: Miner
miner.description: Having most steel and titanium resources combined

mogul.name: Mogul
mogul.description: Highest production of steel, titanium, plants, energy, and heat combined (all except M€ production)

politician.name: Politician
politician.description: Most Party Leaders and influence combined

promoter.name: Promoter
promoter.description: Most cards in your event pile

suburbian.name: Suburbian
suburbian.description: Most tiles on areas along the edges of the map

supplier.name: Supplier
supplier.description: Having most steel and energy resources combined

traveller.name: Traveller
traveller.description: Most Jovian and Earth tags combined

zoologist.name: Zoologist
zoologist.description: Having most animal and microbe resources combined
